org.cyy.fw.android.dborm

类 ORMUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyy.fw.android.dborm.ORMUtil

  • public final class ORMUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Some useful tool method for ORM
    版本:
    [V1.0, 2012-11-19]
    作者:
    cyy

    • 方法详细资料

      • findAssoTargetClass

        public static java.lang.Class<?> findAssoTargetClass(java.lang.Class<?> mainClass,
                                     java.lang.String childFieldName)
                                              throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
        Look up relation target POJO class
        参数:
        mainClass - relation source class
        childFieldName - relation attribute name
        返回:
        the target class, null if failed to look up
        抛出:
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException

      • getOrMapInfo

        public static ORMapInfo getOrMapInfo(ORMapper orMapper,
                     java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<?>,java.lang.String> tableMap)
        Obtain the O-R mapping info of the specified POJO class
        参数:
        orMapper - mapping tool
        clazz - POJO class
        tableMap - table names map
        返回:
        O-R mapping info

      • getPkValue

        public static java.lang.Object getPkValue(java.lang.Object value,
                          ORMapInfo mapInfo)
        Obtain the primary key value of POJO
        参数:
        value - POJO
        mapInfo - O-R mapping info
        返回:
        the value of primary key

      • mappingColumnByField

        public static java.lang.String[] mappingColumnByField(java.lang.String[] fields,
                                      ORMapInfo mapInfo)
        mapping attributes to columns
        参数:
        fields - names of POJO's attributes
        mapInfo - O-R mapping info
        返回:
        columns of DB table

      • createUID

        public static java.lang.String createUID(UniqueIDGenerator idGenerator)

      • filtNullPks

        public static java.lang.Object[] filtNullPks(java.lang.Object[] pks)
        filter out primary keys of null value
        参数:
        pks - original primary keys
        返回:
        primary keys after filtering out
